name: Green Thinker
description:
GREEN THINKER

Green Thinker is a serious game and its main purpose is to educate childen about recycling.  They can learn about the need of recycling and how to sort and reuse trash.

----------------------------------------------------------

Controls:
  • Left/Right Arrows to move the character
  • Space to  step into an area (Beach, Park, House, Closet)
  • LeftMouse Button to  open the backpack
  • Up/Down Arrows to move the turtle character
  • Drag&Drop (LeftMouse Button)  to throw trash to can
